title: 10 minute Stretching Routine I Beginner FOLLOW ALONG
description:
This 10min follow along beginner friendly stretching routine will help you get flexible and improve your mobility. Adding mobility flow and dynamic stretches into your flexibility training will help you make fast flexibility improvements. This mobility routine can help release tight back muscles and includes back pain relief exercises, stretches to help improve your squat depth and deadlift flexibility.

This 10min follow along takes you through a full body flexibility routine hitting all the major muscle groups.

SUBSCRIBE @TomPetoTraining

comments: What kind of ‘follow alongs’ would you like to see more of? I’ll get on it!
I am the opposite of flexible and I'm always looking for a decent 10 minute stretch that's doable and effective and I've finally found that here! Thank you so much!
Love to see more 10 minute routines. Thanks for your clear insturctions: positions per muscle and what we are looking to accomplish!
Loving this simple and well guided stretch routine. Just what I needed after a long day stuck at an office desk. Day 2 of the Advent Challenge, done :)
